LABEL: SQ01
en-US: On a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being great, and 5 being poor.  How satisfied were you with today's call?

LABEL: SQ02
en-US: Were we able to resolve your request today?    Press 1 for yes, 2 for no.

LABEL: SQ03
en-US: Did the representative understand your needs?  Press 1 for yes, 2 for no.

LABEL: surveygreet
en-US: We appreciate the time you're taking to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback is valued, and will be used to continue to improve the service we provide.

LABEL: surveyend
en-US: Thank you for your time. We appreciate your assistance in helping us to continue to improve our service.

LABEL: surveyerror
en-US: There was an error processing your survey responses.

LABEL: closed
en-US: Our office is currently closed. Regular business hours are 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Monday to Friday, except statutory holidays.

LABEL: holiday
en-US: Our office is currently closed. Regular business hours are 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Monday to Friday, except statutory holidays.

LABEL: monitor
en-US: For accuracy and service quality purposes, your call may be monitored and recorded.  Our team is dedicated to providing you with the best possible service.  Any form of discrimination, or disrespectful behavior, may result in our representative ending your call without resolving your inquiry.

LABEL: noagents
en-US: Our representatives are unable to take your call at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please try back later.

LABEL: pleasehold
en-US: Please hold for the next available representative.

LABEL: busy1
en-US: Your call is important to us. All of our representatives are still assisting other callers.  You are currently

LABEL: busy2
en-US: in line for the next available agent.  Your estimated wait time is

LABEL: busy3
en-US: minutes.

LABEL: highvolume
en-US: We are currently experiencing a high volume of calls.

LABEL: stillbusy
en-US: Your call is important to us. All of our representatives are still assisting other callers.

LABEL: callbackmenu
en-US: If you would like to hold your place in the queue but request a call back when a representative becomes available, please press 1. Otherwise, please remain on the line.

LABEL: entercallback
en-US: To receive a call back on the phone number you're calling from, press 1.  Otherwise, please enter the 10-digit phone number you would like us to use.

LABEL: entercallback2
en-US: Please enter the 10-digit phone number where you'd like to receive a callback.

LABEL: callbacknotice
en-US: Thanks!  One of our representatives will call you back shortly.  Thanks for calling.

LABEL: voicemail
en-US: We are currently not available to take your call.  Please leave a message after the tone and we will return your call as soon as possible.

LABEL: saved
en-US: Your message has been saved. An agent will return your call as soon as possible.

LABEL: goodbye
en-US: Thank you for calling. Goodbye.

LABEL: difficulties
en-US: We apologize, we're experiencing technical difficulties and cannot take your call at this time. Please try again later.

LABEL: InvalidInput1
en-US: That was an invalid selection.

LABEL: NoInput1
en-US: Are you still there?

LABEL: enterID
en-US: Please enter your identification number.

LABEL: youentered
en-US: You entered

LABEL: confirmentry
en-US: If this is correct, press 1.  Otherwise, press 2.

LABEL: AccountBalance1
en-US: <prosody rate="90%">Your account balance is

LABEL: AccountBalance2
en-US: <break time="1000ms"/>Bill payment is due by

LABEL: AccountBalance3
en-US: </prosody><break time="1000ms"/>To make a credit card payment, press 1.  To repeat the account balance, press 7.  To return to the previous menu, press 9.

LABEL: CSClosedMessage
en-US: Our office is currently closed, please call back during regular business hours. Thank you for calling. Goodbye.

LABEL: ANIMatch
en-US: We found an account associated with the phone number you're calling from.  If this is the account you're calling about, press 1.  Otherwise, press 2.

LABEL: EnterAccountNumber
en-US: Please enter your Account Number.

LABEL: ReEnterAccountNumber
en-US: We do not recognize the account number you entered. Please try re-entering the account number again.

LABEL: UnauthClosed
en-US: We are unable to complete your request with the information provided.  Please contact us during regular business hours.  Thank you for calling.

LABEL: NotAuthenticated
en-US: We are unable to access your account with the information you provided.  Please hold while we transfer your call to the next available representative.

LABEL: EnterPIN
en-US: Please enter your pin.

LABEL: ReEnterPIN
en-US: The number you entered does not match our records.

LABEL: CurrentBalance1
en-US: Your current balance is

LABEL: CurrentBalance2
en-US: To pay your current balance, press 1. To pay a different amount, press 2.

LABEL: EnterPaymentAmount
en-US: Please enter the payment amount you wish to make, in dollars and cents, followed by the pound key.  For example, ten dollars and 50 cents, would be entered as, one zero five zero, followed by the pound key.

LABEL: ConfirmPaymentAmount1
en-US: We will be processing a total payment amount of

LABEL: ConfirmPaymentAmount2
en-US: which includes a 1.75% service fee of

LABEL: ConfirmPaymentAmount3
en-US: . To proceed and confirm this payment, press 1. To enter a different amount, press 2.

LABEL: GetCCNumber
en-US: Please enter your 16 digit credit card number.

LABEL: EnterExpiryDate
en-US: Enter your 4 digit expire re date, using month year format.

LABEL: EnterCVV
en-US: Enter the three digit security code, or CVV, found on the back of your credit card.

LABEL: PaymentSuccess
en-US: Your payment was successful.

LABEL: PaymentFailed
en-US: We were unable to process your payment.

LABEL: ConfirmPhoneReceipt1
en-US: Your transaction reference number is,

LABEL: ConfirmPhoneReceipt2
en-US: To receive a payment confirmation text message to the mobile phone you are calling from, press 1.  To send the receipt to a different mobile phone number, press 2.  To repeat this message, press 7.

LABEL: EnterPhoneNumber
en-US: Please enter the 10-digit mobile phone number where you would like to receive your payment confirmation.

LABEL: ReceiptSent
en-US: A receipt of your payment was sent successfully.

LABEL: ReceiptFailed
en-US: We were unable to send your receipt.

LABEL: Reconnect
en-US: Please hold while we reconnect you to the representative for further assistance.

LABEL: InvalidAmount
en-US: The amount entered is invalid.

LABEL: InvalidCCNumber
en-US: The credit card number entered is invalid.

LABEL: InvalidExpDate
en-US: The expiry date entered is invalid.

LABEL: InvalidCVV
en-US: The security code entered is invalid.

LABEL: MinimumPayAmount
en-US: The payment amount must be at least $10.00. Please enter a new payment amount.

LABEL: MaximumPayAmount
en-US: The payment amount cannot be more than $25,000. Please enter a new payment amount.

LABEL: EnterUserExtension
en-US: Please enter the 4 digit extension of the person you're trying to reach.  To use our company directory, press pound.

LABEL: InvalidExtenstion
en-US: That was an invalid extension

LABEL: SayUserName
en-US: Please say the first and last name of the person you're trying to reach.

LABEL: InvalidUser
en-US: I couldn't find
